::Battera::

She reached the hatch and ran through it.  She stood outside the 
hatch catching her breath. She was having fun for the first time 
since she had arrived to this base.  She found herself laughing and 
having fun.  She was enjoying this time to relax and forget the war 
and the fighting.  It felt great to just let her wings down for a 
while. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow <twb176@y...> wrote:
> ::WindRider::
> "Oh no, I don't think so," he says to Battera, "You're
> not gonna get away from me that easy!"He took off
> after her. For a moment, the crash, being stuck in the
> middle of this terrible war, all that escaped from his
> mind. He felt like a little child again. He knew that
> whatever happened, he wanted to spend as much time
> getting to know this ladybot as he could.
>
